column2:
"...what smooth progress we've made.
Everything is going according to our
plan."

"...it is important to gain knowledge through
cooperation. After all, growth is an
important role as an ARKS member."

"..Alright, let's return now.
Come to my place after you do."

"……とてもいい展開ね。
貴方も私も、思い描いたとおりに
動けてる。"

"……連携から何かを得ることが大事。
成長はアークスのつとめ、だから。"

"……それじゃ、一度戻りましょう。
帰還したら、私の所まで来て。"
